subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Decisions of the two catchers, the Mets’ Travis d’Arnaud and the Cubs’ Miguel Montero, quite likely led to a two-run swing in a two-run game.
snippet: Decisions of the two catchers, the Mets’ Travis d’Arnaud and the Cubs’ Miguel Montero, quite likely led to a two-run swing in a two-run game.
